mapper.select: SELECT TO_CHAR(orderdate, 'YYYY-MM') AS orderdate, SUM(o.pamount * p.price) AS totalPrice FROM orderInfo o INNER JOIN product p ON o.pnum = p.pnum GROUP BY TO_CHAR(orderdate, 'YYYY-MM') ORDER BY orderdate

SELECT SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(orderdate, 'MM'), '01', pamount, 0)) AS "1월", SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(orderdate, 'MM'), '02', pamount, 0)) AS "2월", SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(orderdate, 'MM'), '03', pamount, 0)) AS "3월", SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(orderdate, 'MM'), '04', pamount, 0)) AS "4월", SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(orderdate, 'MM'), '05', pamount, 0)) AS "5월", SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(orderdate, 'MM'), '06', pamount, 0)) AS "6월", SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(orderdate, 'MM'), '07', pamount, 0)) AS "7월", SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(orderdate, 'MM'), '08', pamount, 0)) AS "8월", SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(orderdate, 'MM'), '09', pamount, 0)) AS "9월", SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(orderdate, 'MM'), '10', pamount, 0)) AS "10월", SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(orderdate, 'MM'), '11', pamount, 0)) AS "11월", SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(orderdate, 'MM'), '12', pamount, 0)) AS "12월" FROM orderInfo

SELECT SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(orderdate, 'MM'), '01', o.pamount * p.price, 0)) AS "1월", SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(orderdate, 'MM'), '02', o.pamount * p.price, 0)) AS "2월", SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(orderdate, 'MM'), '03', o.pamount * p.price, 0)) AS "3월", SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(orderdate, 'MM'), '04', o.pamount * p.price, 0)) AS "4월", SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(orderdate, 'MM'), '05', o.pamount * p.price, 0)) AS "5월", SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(orderdate, 'MM'), '06', o.pamount * p.price, 0)) AS "6월", SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(orderdate, 'MM'), '07', o.pamount * p.price, 0)) AS "7월", SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(orderdate, 'MM'), '08', o.pamount * p.price, 0)) AS "8월", SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(orderdate, 'MM'), '09', o.pamount * p.price, 0)) AS "9월", SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(orderdate, 'MM'), '10', o.pamount * p.price, 0)) AS "10월", SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(orderdate, 'MM'), '11', o.pamount * p.price, 0)) AS "11월", SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(orderdate, 'MM'), '12', o.pamount * p.price, 0)) AS "12월" FROM orderInfo o JOIN product p ON o.pnum = p.pnum GROUP BY TO_CHAR(orderdate, 'YYYY') ORDER BY TO_CHAR(orderdate, 'YYYY')
